EmailTemplate.subject: Application Received for In-Home Aide for {!CLQ_Program_Transaction__c.CLQ_Program_Name__c}, {!CLQ_Program_Transaction__c.CLQ_Program_Number__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
You have successfully submitted an application for certification as an In-Home Aide. A county representative will contact you about next steps in the process. It can take a minimum of 60 days from the application submission date to be approved for a certification. Please contact your County Agency with additional questions.
Contact the Child Care Help Desk for additional assistance at 1-877-302-2347.
The Ohio Child Licensing and Quality System Team.
This e-mail message, including any attachments, is for the sole use of the intended recipient(s) and may contain private, confidential, and/or privileged information. Any unauthorized review, use, disclosure, or distribution is prohibited.
